definitions.definition: the force or action of one object hitting another:
examples: The impact of the crash reduced the car to a third of its original length.

definitions.definition: a powerful effect that something, especially something new, has on a situation or person:
examples: The anti-smoking campaign had had/made quite an impact on young people.

definitions.definition: to have an influence on something:
examples: Falling export rates have impacted (on) the country's economy quite considerably.
